JsonFormatter

class logman.formatter.JsonFormatter(fmt=None, datefmt=None, style='%', validate=True, *, defaults=None)[source]

Bases: Formatter

A custom JSON formatter for Python logging.

This formatter outputs log records as JSON strings with specific fields.

formatTime(record, datefmt=None)[source]

Formats the log record’s timestamp.

formatException(ei)[source]

Formats and returns the exception information as a string.

format(record)[source]

Formats the log record as a JSON string.
